Lina Maria has had to face a lot of problems in her life. Nevertheless they haven’t stopped her from getting ahead as she works hard every day and always has the right attitude. She is a single mother with three children; their father abandoned her and doesn’t provide any financial assistance.

So Lina Maria, faced with earning an income to support the family, began selling a variety of merchandise, a job she’s developed over a long time. Although she knew how to sew, she didn’t know how to market her services. Now she has a contract with a sewing business and she makes products for them. Because of this work, Lina Maria can earn enough money to provide her family with the basic necessities and give her children a better quality of life.

As she has a good contract with the sewing business, Lina Maria now needs to hire someone and buy another sewing machine. She can’t afford to do this so she is hoping that a loan will help her buy a sewing machine for the person she will hire to help her do the work for her customer.

Lina Maria’s dream is for her workshop to keep on growing and her contracts to continue multiplying so that she can hire more employees. She also hopes that her children can go to a good university and eventually get good well-paying jobs.

loans.use: to hire an employee and buy another sewing machine

loans.name: Zainura

texts.ru: Зайнура замужем и любящая мать четверых детей. Муж предприниматель. Более 5 лет она занимается выращиванием арбузов, лук, ячмень и огурцы. Она имеет 5,5 гектаров земли для посева. Она хочет расширить свой бизнес и улучшить свое жилищные условия. С этой целью Зайнура хотела бы получить займ в размере 8000 Сомони для покупки семян, минеральных удобрений и горюче-смазочных материалов. Она надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Zainura is married and is a loving mother of four children. Her husband is an entrepreneur. For over five years Zainura has been growing watermelons, onions, barley and cucumbers. She has 5.5 hectares of land for sowing. Zainura would like to receive a loan of 8000 somoni in order to buy seeds, mineral fertilizer and fuel. She is looking forward to your kindness and help.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, seeds and fuel

loans.name: Irma Carolina

texts.es: La Señora Irma Carolina de 34 años de edad,es casada y tiene 3 hijos, anterior mente ella solicito un credito para la inbercion en maquinas para un café internet,el cual se encuentra administrando y a podido ber el crecimientos de su negocio,ya que los creditos que le han otorgado tanto Fape como Kiva le han ayudado para que ella cresca como pequeña microempresaria y no solo eso, si no que tambien le a ayudado a tomar muevos retos,le da gracias a Dios por la oportuidad que le a dado atraves de su negocio y de terminar bien en su credito anterior ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de otras maquinas para su café internet ya que las maquinas que tiene no se dan abasto para prestar el servicio de internet a los estudiantes de su colonia,el sueño y el proposito de ella es poder acreditarse dia con dia en este negocio,y con la ayuda de Dios esperando que todos lo propositos que ella tiene puedan llevarse a cabo conforme a los planes de Dios y asi poder ir creciendo dia con dia como una microempresaria.
texts.en: Sra. Irma Carolina, 34, is married and has 3 children.  She received a loan before that she used to buy computers for her Internet cafe business.  She´s operated the business for some time now and, thanks to the loans that she´s received from Fape and, of course, Kiva lenders, she´s a successful businesswoman now and ready to take on new challenges.  She wants to grow her business so she´s applying for a new loan that she will use to buy new computers for her Internet cafe.  The computers she has aren´t robust enough to provide the service that her customers now need.  Her goal for the future is to continue growing her business and developing as an entrepreneur.

loans.use: to buy computers for her Internet cafe business.

loans.name: Maria Ofelia

texts.es:
Maria Ofelia es una persona que ha sido fuertemente golpeada por la violencia. 
Anteriormente vivía en un sector muy vulnerable y allí perdió a dos de sus hijos, uno de ellos le ayudaba con el sustento de los gastos del hogar. 
Además de esto, Maria Ofelia es una madre soltera cabeza de familia que tiene a su cargo en el momento su única hija y su nieta. 
Maria Ofelia en vista de que ella era la única que podía generar los ingresos para su hogar, empezó a buscar en la calle muchas maneras de generar sus ingresos, vendiendo cualquier clase de mercancía. Gracias a que es muy organizada con su dinero, Maria Ofelia ahorró gran parte de sus ganancias, y con la ayuda de un subsidio del gobierno, le fue otorgada la posibilidad de comprar una casa a muy buen precio. 
Actualmente Maria Ofelia vive en su casa donde montó una tienda general, donde vende todos los productos de la canasta familiar. 
Con el ánimo de aumentar sus ingresos, Maria Ofelia quiere comprar productos de papelería para afrontar la temporada escolar, sin embargo, Maria Ofelia no tiene el capital disponible para hacer estas compras, por lo que tiene la esperanza en que un préstamo le brindará la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de los productos de papelería como son cuadernos, cartulinas, lapiceros, borradores, entre otros, y así afrontar con un buen surtido el inicio de la temporada escolar.
Maria Ofelia sueña con que su hija y su nieta puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida, y puedan progresar laboral y económicamente. Es por esto que trabaja fuertemente y quiere brindarle a su nieta la mejor educación posible.
texts.en:
Maria Ofelia has suffered a lot from violence. She used to live in a tough neighbourhood where she lost two of her children, one of whom used to help her pay for household expenses. She is a single mother still responsible for her daughter and granddaughter. As she was the only one who could earn a living, she began searching in the streets for any way she could to earn money. She sold a variety of merchandise. Because she is very organised, she saved a large part of her income and with help from a government subsidy, she managed to buy a house at a good price.

Currently Maria Ofelia runs a store out of her house where she sells basic, everyday items. Because she wants to increase her income, she wishes to buy school supplies. However, she cannot afford to do this so she is hoping a loan will enable her to buy items such as notebooks, card, pencils, erasers etc. and thus take advantage of the upcoming school year. 

Maria Ofelia’s dream is that her daughter and granddaughter can have a better quality of life and can get ahead both economically and in the work place. This is the reason why she works hard; she wants her granddaughter to have the best upbringing possible.

loans.use: to buy items such as notebooks, card, pencils, erasers etc.

loans.name: Leonora

texts.en:
Leonora is 51 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is widowed with two children.

Leonora has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, and beverages. She has had this business for 10 years. She has requested a loan for PHP 8,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, and beverages.

Leonora has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Leonora hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks, and beverages for sale.

loans.name: Luz

texts.en:

Luz has a food shop, or carenderia, that sells viands (tasty dishes) like afritada, caldereta, and adobo. She has had this business for five years. She has requested a loan of PHP 8,000 to buy the raw ingredients needed for making viands (tasty dishes).

Luz has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Luz hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients needed for making viands (tasty dishes).

Evelyn has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Evelyn hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy beauty products from NATASHA & AVON.

Melanie is 41 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with three children.

Melanie has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Melanie hopes to improve her business.

Francisca has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Francisca hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy bananas to sell.

Edna is 48 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with five children.

Edna has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, and beverages. She has had this business for five years. She has requested a loan of PHP 8,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, and beverages.

Edna has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Edna hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks, and beverages for sale.

loans.name: Bitcherose

texts.en:
Bitcherose is 33 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 2 children. 

Bitcherose has a bakeshop that sells bread, "monay" & cheese bread. She has had this business for 8 years. She requested a loan for 8,000 PHP to buy raw ingredients for the bakeshop.

Bitcherose has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Bitcherose hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients for the bakeshop.

loans.name: Pacita

Pacita is 39 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 4 children. 

Pacita has a shop that sells clothing & beauty products from AVON & NATASHA. She is also buying & selling dried fish. She has had this business for 5 years. She requested a loan for 8,000 PHP to buy stock from NATASHA & AVON.

Pacita has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Pacita hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy stock from NATASHA & AVON.

loans.name: Florita

Florita is 48 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 5 children. 

Florita has a vulcanizing shop that provides motor repairs. She has had this business for 5 years. She requested a loan for 8,000 PHP to buy tools & pay for the electricity for the vulcanizing shop.

Florita has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Florita hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy tools & pay for the electricity for the vulcanizing shop.

loans.name: Saturnino

texts.en:
Saturnino is 57 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married with 4 children. 

Saturnino has a shop that sells rice per kilogram. He has had this business for 5 years. He requested a loan for 8,000 PHP to buy sacks of rice to sell.

Saturnino has been a member of HSPFI for since 2011.  In the future, Saturnino hopes to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy sacks of rice to sell.

loans.name: Elaine

texts.en:
Elaine is 46 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is widowed with 5 children. 

Elaine has a shop that sells snacks like hard-boiled duck eggs or "balot". She has had this business for 17 years. She requested a loan for 8,000 PHP to buy duck eggs for making "balot" to sell.

Elaine has been a member of HSPFI since 2010.  In the future, Elaine hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy duck eggs for making "balot" to sell.

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en: Catherine is 34 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has three children. Catherine has a retail shop that sells canned goods, snacks, and beverages. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan for 8,000 PHP to buy more canned goods, snacks, and beverages. Catherine has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Catherine hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks, and beverages

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther is 27 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with two children.

Esther has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, and beverages. She also buys and sells firewood. She has had this business for two years. She has requested a loan of PHP 8,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, and beverages.

Esther has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Esther hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks, and beverages for sale.

loans.name: Anita

texts.en: Anita is 56 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has five children. Anita has a shop where she makes and sells homemade sausage, or longganisa and tocino. She has had this business for four years. She requested a loan for 8,000 PHP to buy raw ingredients for making homemade sausage. Anita has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Anita hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients for making homemade sausage

loans.name: Marialou

texts.en: Marialou is 38 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has one child. Marialou has a shop that sells a variety of dried fish. She has had this business for three years. She requested a loan for 8,000 PHP to buy dried fish for resale. Marialou has been a member of HSPFI since 2010.  In the future, Marialou hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy dried fish

loans.name: Annabelle

texts.en: Annabelle is 32 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has three children. Annabelle has a shop that sells homemade sausage (longganisa and tocino) and dried fish. She has had this business for four years. She requested a loan for 8,000 PHP to buy raw ingredients for making homemade sausage. Annabelle has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Annabelle hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients for making homemade sausage

loans.name: Lilian

texts.en: Lilian is 54 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has one child. Lilian has a shop that sells homemade sausage (longganisa and tocino) and dried fish. She has had this business for 10 years. She requested a loan for 8,000 PHP to buy raw ingredients for making homemade sausage. Lilian has been a member of HSPFI since 2009. In the future, Lilian hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients for making homemade sausage

loans.name: Ousmane

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un homme marié qui vit avec sa femme et ses 03 enfants. Deux des enfants sont des élèves, à l'école primaire.Il exerce un commerce de produits agricoles notamment , la paille d'arachide qui marche bien en cette période de l'année.Il se rend à l'intérieur du pays , dans les régions de forte production et s'approvisionne à bon prix. Les sacs sont alors transportés dans des camions qui l'acheminent dans sa localité , à quelques 300km.Cette activité, quoique très dure, lui rapport des revenus assez substantiels;Ce qui lui permet de prendre en charge l'ensemble des dépenses d'entretien de sa famille ainsi que les frais de scolarité de ses enfants.Afin d'augmenter son fonds de commerce, il sollicite auprès de l'UIMCEC un pret de 300000f pour acheter 200 sacs de paille d'arachide.Son ambition est de construire sa propre maison et de quitter le bâtiment qui lui est prêté et dont la construction n'est pas encore terminée.
texts.en: This borrower is married and lives with his wife and three children.  Two of his children are students at the primary school.  He deals in agricultural products, especially peanut plant stalks which sell quite well this time of year.  He goes to the central part of the country where he buys his supplies at a good price.  The sacks are then transported in trucks which pass through his area, about 300km away.  This work, as hard as it is, brings him substantial income which allows him to cover family expenses as well as the cost of sending his children to school.  In order to increase his working capital, he is requesting a loan through l’UIMCEC of 300,000 fr to buy 200 sacks of peanut plant stalks.  His goal is to build his own house and to leave the building that has been loaned to him, which is still under construction.

loans.use: to buy 200 sacks of peanut plant stalks.

loans.name: Alba Yamid

texts.es:
Alba ha sido reconocida en su familia y sus amigos por ser una persona muy trabajadora y dedicada a su hogar.
Con 35 años de edad, Alba se encuentra casada y siempre ha querido que en su hogar nunca les falte nada; por eso trabaja fuertemente todos los días, con el ánimo de generar los ingresos suficientes para mejorarle la calidad de vida a su esposo.
Alba anteriormente trabajaba en la actividad de la confección en talleres de amigos y vecinos, hasta que un día una amiga que trabaja en un hospital le consiguió un contrato para que arreglara los uniformes de los enfermeros y las sábanas de las camillas del hospital.
Desde entonces Alba ha tenido muy buen flujo de trabajo, a tal punto que actualmente requiere la contratación de una persona para que le ayude en la confección de sus productos. Es por esto que Alba necesita comprar una máquina plana para poder tener donde trabajar la nueva persona que va a contratar; sin embargo, Alba no cuenta con el capital suficiente para la compra de la máquina, por lo que aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de una máquina plana para tener donde trabajar la nueva persona que va a contratar.
Alba tiene el sueño de que su negocio crezca, y posteriormente no solo arregle los uniformes de los enfermeros, sino que tenga su línea propia de confección y venda sus productos por toda la región.
Alba, además de esto, sueña con que ella y su esposo puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida, y en un futuro cuando tengan un hijo, le puedan brindar todo lo que necesita.
texts.en:
Alba is known by her family and friends as a person who is very hardworking and dedicated to her home.

Alba, 35, is married and has always wanted her family to have everything they need, and so she works very hard every day with the goal of generating enough income to improve the quality of life of her husband.

Previously, Alba worked in her friend's and neighbor's tailoring shops, until one day a friend who worked in a hospital gave her a contract to repair the nurses uniforms and the sheets on the hospital gurneys.  

Ever since, Alba has had a good flow of incoming work, so much that now she needs to hire a person to help her make her products.  For this reason, Alba needs to buy an industrial sewing machine.  She is requesting a loan to finance the purchase of a sewing machine so that the person she hires will have equipment to work with.  

Alba has a dream of growing her business and later, not only repairing nurse's uniforms, but having her own line of clothing and selling her products throughout the region.

In addition to this, Alba dreams of having a better quality of life for herself and her husband, and in the future having a child with him, and providing that child with everything he needs.

loans.use: to buy an industrial sewing machine so that she will have equipment for the new person that she is going to hire

loans.name: Eufemia

texts.en:
Eufemia is 48 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is separated and has two children.

Eufemia has a shop that sells DXN products and food supplements. She has had this business for five years. She has requested a loan of PHP 8,000 to buy stocks of products from DXN for sale.

Eufemia has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Eufemia hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy stocks of products from DXN for sale.

loans.name: Dominga

texts.en:
Dominga is 43 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with three children.

Dominga has a shop that makes and sells homemade sausage, or longganisa, and tocino (cured pork). She has had this business for ten years. She has requested a loan of PHP 8,000 to buy raw ingredients for making homemade sausage.

Dominga has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Dominga hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients for making homemade sausage.

loans.name: Saliou

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un homme marié, père de deux enfants dont un élève.Il exerce un commerce de matériel informatique mais également de véhicules.Il fait aussi du transfert de l'aéroport aux hôtels situés sur la petite côte.Ces diverses activités lui permettent de générer des revenus assez consistants qui lui permettent de participer aux charges d'entretien familial notamment les frais de scolarité des enfants, l'alimentation, la santé, l'habillement...Afin d'améliorer ses conditions de travail, il sollicite un pret de 500000f pour compléter son capital et acheter un véhicule. Son ambition est d'élargir son activité et de se lancer aussi dans l'immobilier.
texts.en: This borrower is married and the father of two children, one of whom is a student.  He deals in computer hardware as well as automobiles.  He also provides a taxi service from the airport to hotels located near the coast.  These various jobs bring him a consistent income which allows him to meet family responsibilities, especially school fees for his children, food, healthcare and clothing expenses.  In order to improve his working conditions, he is requesting a loan of 500,000f in order to buy an automobile.  His goal is to expand his work and get involved with real estate.

loans.use: buy an automobile.

loans.name: Rita Janeth

texts.es: Doña Rita tiene 38 años de edad,tiene una hija de 9 años de edad,ella se dedica a la venta de ropa de segunda,tambien vende zapatos,y cosmeticos, tiene 7 años de dedicarse a la venta de ropa de segunda primero solo vendia de 10 a 20 prendas pero poco a poco a aumentado la venta,es por eso que esta solicitando este credito para la compra de una paca de ropa y tener mas variedad en ropa,el sueño de ella es ayudar a su hija y darle lo necesario para que estudie, y tenga un mejor futuro.
texts.en: Doña Rita is 38 years old and has a 9 year old daughter.  She sells secondhand clothing for a living.  She also sells shoes and cosmetics.  She has been selling secondhand clothing for 7 years and at first, she only sold 10 to 20 items, but little by little, she has increased her sales.  It is for this reason that she is requesting a loan to buy a large bundle of clothing and have more variety.  Her dream is to help her daughter by giving her what she needs to study and have a better future.

loans.use: purchase a large bundle of secondhand clothing

loans.name: Karina Rosmery

texts.es:
Karina tiene 18 años de edad, es soltera y vive con su mamá. Ella se dedica a elaborar hamacas desde los 7 años de edad, su mamá fue quien le enseño para que se ganara la vida. Karina antes solo se dedicaba a estudiar, actualmente ha terminado sus estudios de básica y quiere dedicarse a la elaboración de artesanías para ayudar a su mamá. Ella compra los materiales para elaborar las hamacas como el hilo de seda, en una ciudad del oriente del país, para llegar tiene que caminar a pie durante treinta minutos y luego aborda un autobús, Karina siempre viaja con su mamá pues es ella quien la asesora.

Karina solicita el préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar más materia prima, ya que quiere trabajar por su propia cuenta, así lograra aumentar la oferta a sus clientes, teniendo todos los materiales necesarios y en cantidades suficientes. También Karina recibirá sus propios ingresos económicos que le permitirán ayudar a su mamá con los gastos de la casa, ya que solo vive con su mamá y un hermano.

Ella esta pensando en instalar una tienda de productos básicos, ya que en la comunidad donde viven no hay, y seria una muy buena fuente de ingresos.
texts.en:
Karina, 18, is single and lives with her mother.  She has been making hammocks since she was 7 years old.  Her mother taught her this trade so that she could earn a living.  Previously, Karina devoted her time to studying, but now she has completed her basic education and wants to work making handicrafts to help her mother.  She buys the supplies she needs to make hammocks, such as silk thread, in a city in the eastern part of the country.  To get there, she must walk for 30 minutes and then later take a bus.  Karina always travels with her mother, as she is the one who advises her.

Karina is requesting a loan from Fundación Campo to buy more supplies, since she wants to work on her own business.  In this way, she will be able to increase the products she offers to her customers, since she will have all the materials she needs in sufficient quantities.  In addition, Karina will receive her own income, and this will allow her to help her mother with the household expenses, since she lives with only her mother and one brother.

She is thinking about starting up a store selling basic consumer goods, because the community where she lives does not have this kind of store, and this type of business would provide a good source of income.

loans.use: to buy more supplies to make hammocks

loans.name: Merced

texts.en:
Merced is 46 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with two children.

Merced has a shop that sells a variety of dried fish. She has had this business for six years. She has requested a loan of PHP 8,000 to buy dried fish for sale.

Merced has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Merced hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy dried fish for sale.

loans.name: Maribe

texts.en:
Maribe is 49 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with four children.

Maribe has a shop that sells frozen foods like hotdogs, tocino (cured pork), and sliced chicken. She has had this business for five years. She has requested a loan of PHP 8,000 to buy stocks of frozen foods for sale.

Maribe has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Maribe hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy stocks of frozen foods for sale.

loans.name: Michel

texts.fr:
Ce client est age de 35 ans maintenant, il est celibataire  et père d'un enfant. Il ouvre un salon de coiffure et pour prendre en charge ses propres besoins.
Ses recettes ont largement augmentes , il a a en moyenne 15.000 frs a 25.000 frs par jour , il a fait des épargnes considérables et a améliorer la qualité de ses services et son salon est plus présentable et a une forte clientèle surtout  pendant les weekend end.
Pour ce nouveau prêt , il a renforcer le stock des lames, rasoirs , acheter des chaises en plastiques et un petit frigo pour vendre la boisson a ses clients qui sont en attente.
Tres pragmatique, il tient a aller loin et comme bon père de famille , il assure la scolarité de ses enfants.
texts.en:
This borrower is 35 years old, single and the father of one child.  He is opening a hair salon so that he can cover his personal expenses. 
His receipts have greatly increased; he averages 15.000 frs – 25.000 per day.  He has considerable savings and has been able to improve the quality of his services.  His salon is more attractive and he has a loyal customer base, especially on the weekends. 
With this new loan he will stock up on blades and razors.  He will buy plastic chairs and a small fridge for selling drinks to his customers while they wait. 
Very pragmatic, he wants to be successful.   As a good father to his family, he will provide his children with an education. 
.

loans.use: update his salon with new wall paint, mirrors, scissors and a small generator

loans.name: Duo Mujeres De San Lorenzo Group

texts.es: El dúo mujeres de san Lorenzo está formado por  doña  Catarina de 58 años tiene 5 hijos y es viuda ella se dedica a la elaboración de muñequitos típicos (muñecos quitapenas)  y también se dedica a la agricultura ella cosecha manía y eso le ayuda a solventar sus gastos, ya obtuvo  un crédito y lo utilizo para la compra de materiales  para elaborar sus muñequitos  y solventar su demanda de pedidos esto la ayudo para satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes,  actualmente ella solicita nuevamente que la apoyen porque es un gran apoyo que ella recibe con el crédito,es por eso que esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materiales para elavorar muñequitos  tipicos, y compra de abono para su cultivo. doña  Aura Leticia tiene  38 años de edad tiene 4 hijos,   ella se dedica a la elaboración de los muñequitos típicos (muñecos quitapenas) ella ya obtuvo un crédito que fue invertido en la compra de materiales  para la elaboración de muñequitos típicos, esto la ayudo a satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes porque tiene más pedidos, ella solicita un crédito para poder comprar material  y elaborar los muñequitos típicos,  las señoras han superado en sus negocio y han crecido.
texts.en:
The Group “Duo Mujeres de San Lorenzo” was organized by Catarina who is 58 years old, has 5 children, and is a widow. She makes traditional dolls and she also farms. Catarina harvests maniac and this helps her cover her expenses. Catarina has already had a loan and used it to buy doll-making materials to cover orders received from her customers.

Now she is once again requesting our assistance because many benefits come with a loan. That is why she is soliciting this loan to buy materials for making traditional dolls plus fertilizer for her cultivated land. 

Aura Leticia is 38 years old and has 4 children. She too makes traditional dolls (of the “quitapenas” type). She also received a loan in the past and invested it in doll-making materials. Now, this loan will assist her in meeting her customers' demand -- she has more orders for typical dolls – by financing the purchase of more materials.

The two women have advanced their businesses and have grown.

loans.use: buy materials to make typical traditional dolls, plus buy fertilizer for their farms.

location.town: Aldea San Lorenzo el Cubo,Ciudad Vieja Sacatepeque

loans.name: Wendy Xiomara

texts.es:
Wendy tiene 25 años de edad, esta acompañada y tiene una hija.

Ella vive con sus padres, su hija y cuatro hermanos, en su familia siempre se han dedicado al cultivo de granos básicos para consumo de la familia.

Wendy solicita el préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar madera, teja, cemento, pago de mano de obra para terminar de construir su casa de adobe, ya que en la que están viviendo es de lamina y ya esta dañada, su esposo le ha ayudado a empezar la construcción pero ya no puede seguir enviándole dinero desde los estados unidos, por eso ella decidió solicitar el préstamo. Al tener su nueva casa, estarán más cómodos ya que en total son 10 personas las que habitaran sus padres, cuatro hermanos ella, su hija y sobrinos. Todos ellos vivirán mejor, más cómodos y seguros. Wendy desea tener una vivienda digna, ver crecer a su hija y ponerle piso a su casa, instalarle la energía eléctrica a la casa, por que no tienen.
texts.en:
Wendy is 25 years old, married and has a daughter.  She lives with her parents, her daughter and her 4 siblings.  Her family has always grown basic food staples for their own consumption.  

Wendy is requesting a loan through Fundación Campo to buy wood, tile, cement and to pay for labor to finish construction on her adobe house.  The one in which they are living now is made of sheets of metal and is damaged.  Her husband has helped her to start the construction, but can no longer send her money from the United States.  Because of this she decided to request a loan.  Her new house will be more comfortable since there are 10 people living with her parents, her and her four siblings, her daughter, and her nieces and nephews.  They will all live better, more comfortably and more secure. 

Wendy wants to have decent housing, to see her daughter grow, and install a floor and electricity in the house as they don't have either.

loans.use: purchase wood, tile, cement and labor to finish construction on her adobe house.

loans.name: Andres Felipe

texts.es:
Andres es un joven que es reconocido en su familia y por los habitantes del sector, por tener un muy buen talento para la música.
Desde muy pequeño se ha visto entusiasmado con el hecho de hacer música, pertenecer a una banda y vender el producto de su dote artístico.
Hace un tiempo que pertenece a una banda, donde realizaron un CD para sacarlo a la venta, lo que es un gran orgullo tanto para el como para su familia.
Andres siempre ha querido aportar ingresos para su hogar, por lo que siempre ha querido grabar un CD y sacarlo a la venta, de modo que le genere ingresos y pueda aportar a los gastos de su hogar.
Debido a que apenas están iniciando en el ámbito de la música, Andres se ha visto muy corto de dinero para poder terminar el pago del CD que grabó con su banda. Ya ha hecho muchas maneras de generar ingresos, tanto en rifas, como vendiendo cualquier productos, pero ahora, ya no le queda otra oportunidad que acudir con las esperanzas puestas en que un préstamo le permitirá acceder a terminar de pagar el costo de la grabación del CD para que así puedan reproducirlo y sacarlo a la venta.
Andres siempre ha soñado con que su familia tenga una mejor calidad de vida, y espera que con esto sean unos nuevos ingresos que le permitan iniciar el cumplimiento de este sueño.
texts.en:
Andres is a young man, who is well-known in his family and by the residents of his neighborhood, for having outstanding musical talent. Since he was young he has been excited about making music, being in a band and selling the product of his artistic talent.  He belonged to a band some time ago that made a CD to sell that he and his family are very proud of.  Andres has always wanted to contribute to the household income as well as record a CD to sell to generate income so he can contribute to the household expenses. Since he is just starting out in the music business, Andres is short on money to finish paying off the CD he recorded with his band.  He has already done many things to generate income, from participating in the lottery to working in sales but there aren't any other opportunities.  He has high hopes that a loan will allow him to finish paying for the recording costs of the CD so that he can reproduce and distribute it. 

Andres has always dreamed that his family will have a better quality of life and hopes that this will provide new income so he can start fulfilling that dream.

loans.use: finish paying the recording costs for the CD he made with his band so he can start reproducing it to sell.

loans.name: María Virgelina

texts.es:
Maria Virgelina ha sido una persona muy reconocida entre su familia y sus vecinos del sector, por ser muy carismática y siempre estar a la voluntad del servicio de las otras personas. Maria Virgelina siempre ha querido mejorarles la calidad de vida a las personas que más lo necesitan, y esto ha hecho que sea muy apreciada por todos los habitantes del sector.
Maria Virgelina, ha trabajado durante más de 19 años en la confección, y desde hace un tiempo decidió montar su propio taller de confección, para no tener que rendirle cuentas a ningún jefe.
Maria Virgelina actualmente trabaja confeccionando lencería para hogar, como lo son los tendidos, cubre lechos, cortinas, entre otros, y gracias a esto genera los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar. 
Maria Virgelina últimamente ha tenido muy buenos pedidos por parte de sus clientes, sin embargo, se ha dado cuenta como sus pedidos no aumentan por no tener productos físicos para la muestra, pues siempre confeccionaba a los requerimientos de sus clientes, pero ahora, a los clientes les gusta que les muestre diseños y de esta manera hacerle un pedido de ciertas cantidades.
Es por esto que Maria Virgelina requiere comprar algunos insumos como telas, hilos, agujas, entre otros insumos necesarios para la confección, sin embargo, actualmente no cuenta con el capital suficiente para realizar la compra de esta mercancía, por lo que tiene la esperanza de que un préstamo le permita acceder a la compra de los insumos necesarios para la confección como telas, hilos, agujas, entre otros.
Maria Virgelina tiene el sueño de que sus ventas se aumenten considerablemente, de modo que pueda generar mucho empleo para las personas más necesitadas. Igualmente, sueña con que su taller sea reconocido por ser un taller de confección donde sus trabajadores tiene la oportunidad de progresar, y encontrar una estabilidad económica y una mejora en la calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Maria Virgelina is very well-known by her family members and her neighbors for being charismatic and always willing to help others.  She has always wanted to improve the quality of life of those people who need it most and this has made her very valued by all the people who live in her area.

Maria Virgelina has been in the sewing business for more than 19 years.  Some time ago, she decided to set up her own sewing workshop so that she didn't have to answer to a boss.

Maria Virgelina currently works making household furnishings such as bedclothes, bedspreads, drapes, etc.  Thanks to this work, she makes the income she needs to support her household.

Maria Virgelina has recently had very good orders from her customers but she has realized that her orders don't increase because she doesn't have physical products to display.  This is because she has always made her products to her customers' requirements.  However, now her customers like her to show them designs and then make an order with her for certain quantities.

For this reason, Maria Virgelina needs to buy some supplies such as fabric, thread, needles and other products which she uses in her sewing.  Right now, she doesn't have the capital she needs to buy this merchandise.  For this reason, she hopes to receive a loan which will allow her to buy the supplies she needs.

Maria Virgelina's dream is for her sales to increase considerably so that she can create a lot of work for the people who need it most.  She also dreams of her workshop becoming well known as a sewing workshop whose workers have the opportunity to make progress, achieve financial stability and improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy necessary supplies such as fabric, thread, needles, etc. for making household furnishings such as bedclothes, bedspreads and drapes

loans.name: Luis Eduardo

texts.es:
Luis Eduardo trabaja en un parqueadero el cual es conocido por la buena atención que ofrece.
Luis Eduardo siempre ha sido una persona muy amable, y sus clientes siempre prefieren sus servicios que el de cualquier otra persona.
Con 68 años de edad, Luis Eduardo es soltero y tiene un hijo el cual le colabora en los momentos libres. 
Actualmente, Luis Eduardo tiene un parqueadero, y gracias a este parqueadero Luis Eduardo ha podido generar los ingresos necesarios para el sustento de su hogar.
Luis Eduardo últimamente ha tenido muy buena clientela, y su parqueadero ha visto las consecuencias de ellos, pues sus instalaciones ya se han visto un poco deterioradas por soportar el paso de tantos carros.
Con el ánimo de no perder sus clientes por el deterioro de su parqueadero, Luis Eduardo quiere realizarle reformas locativas a su parqueadero, sin embargo, no cuenta con el capital suficiente para poder llevar esto a cabo; es por esto que tiene la esperanza en que un préstamo le permitirá acceder a realizar reformas locativas en su parqueadero de modo que sus clientes sigan visitándolo y prefiriéndolo por encima de los otros parqueaderos.
Luis Eduardo sueña con que su parqueadero sea más reconocido, y le genere mayores ingresos que los actuales, así podrá generar empleo para los que más lo necesitan.
Además, Luis Eduardo sueña con que su hijo tenga la oportunidad de acceder a una educación universitaria que le permita desempeñarse en un empleo bien remunerado.
texts.en:
Luis Eduardo runs a parking lot and is well known for the good customer service that he provides.  Luis Eduardo has always been a very friendly person and his customers always prefer to use his services rather than those of others.

At 68 years of age, Luis Eduardo is single.  He has a son who helps him in his free time.  Luis Eduardo has a parking lot and, thanks to this parking lot, he has been able to make the income he needs to support his household.

Lately, Luis Eduardo has had a good number of customers and his parking lot has suffered from this in that his installations have become a little worn by supporting the passage of so many cars.

As he does not want to lose customers owing to the state of repair of his parking lot, Luis Eduardo would like to make some physical improvements to his lot.  However, he does not have the capital he needs to carry out this work.  For this reason, he hopes to receive a loan which will allow him to make the structural improvements he needs to so that his customers continue visiting him and preferring his business over others.

Luis Eduardo dreams of his parking lot becoming better known and making him more income than it does right now.  This would enable him to provide jobs for those who need them most.

In addition, Luis Eduardo dreams of his son having the opportunity to study at university which will allow him to gain a well-paid job.

loans.use: to make some structural improvements to his parking lot so that his customers continue using it

loans.name: Ma. Cielo

texts.en:
Ma. Cielo is 34 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 2 children. Ma. Cielo has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, and beverages. She has had this business for 5 years. Ma. Cielo requested a loan for 8,000 PHP to buy stock of canned goods, snacks, and beverages.

Ma. Cielo has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, she hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks, and beverages to sell.

loans.name: Telma Marina

texts.es:
La señora Telma tiene 44 años de edad, esta acompaña con tres hijos.

Hace 10 años que se dedica al comercio, es propietaria de una tienda, antes vendía mariscos es un negocio de familia, sus hermanos y esposo se dedican a la pesca artesanal. Ella adquiere todo lo que necesita para la tienda en la ciudad, por lo que debe viajar en autobús, además Telma le ayuda a su hermanos y a su esposo a vender mariscos.

Ella solicita un préstamo para comprar granos básicos, azúcar, fríjol, aceite, arroz, entre otros más, ya que su inventario es poco y se le agota muy rápido. Por lo que necesita ofrecer más cantidad y con mayor variedad, para satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes y evitar que ellos compren en otro lugar. Telma pretende brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes, para recibir mejores ganancias para proporcionarle a sus hijos una buena educación y apoyar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar, mejorar su vivienda para construirla más amplia y que sus hijos estudien.
texts.en:
Telma is 44 years old and is married with three children. 

For the past ten years she has made a living as the owner of a small store. Before this she sold seafood in a family business; her brothers and husband make a living in the fishing industry. She buys all that she needs for her store in the city, which she has to take a bus to get to. She also helps her brothers and husband to sell fish. 

She requested a loan to buy basic grains, sugar, beans, oil, rice, among other things because her inventory is low and runs out quickly. She  wants to offer more inventory with more variety to satisfy the demands of her customers so they don't buy things in other stores. Telma intends to provide better service to her customers, to increase her profits. She wants to be able to provide for her children a good education and help her husband with the household expenses, to improve her home to make it bigger and she wants her children to study.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, sugar, beans, oil, rice, among other things because her inventory is low and runs out quickly.

loans.name: Edgar Leonel

texts.es:
Edgar tiene 28 años de edad, vive con su compañera de vida y un hijo de dos años de edad. Desde hace 13 años él se ha dedicado a la elaboración y venta de pan, fue gracias a un amigo que aprendió este oficio y le dio la oportunidad de venderlo. Se levanta a las 3:30 a.m.  Para prepararse e irse al lugar donde elabora el pan, por la tarde se va en una motocicleta a vender el pan por diferentes cantones y caseríos. Los materiales para elaborar el pan los compra en una ciudad del oriente del país y tarda unos treinta minutos en llegar ahí. 

Hoy en día Edgar quiere instalar su propia panadería, por lo que solicita el préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar 400 ladrillos, 6 bolsas de cemento y para pago de mano de obra, ya que construirá un horno artesanal de barro para coser el pan, porque el horno de gas es muy caro. Así él tendrá su propio negocio, podrá recibir mejores ingresos para su familia, brindarle el estudio a su hijo. Tiene pensado contratar a cuatro panificadores y unos diez vendedores ya cuando tenga instalada su panadería.
texts.en:
Edgar, 28, lives with his life companion and their two-year-old son.  He has been baking and selling bread for 13 years.  He learned this occupation from a friend who also gave him the opportunity to sell it.  He rises at 3:30am to get ready and head out to the place where he makes the bread.  In the afternoon he heads out on a motorcycle to sell the bread in various cantons and settlements.  He buys the ingredients for the bread in a city in the east of the country and takes about thirty minutes to get there.

Today, Edgar wants to set up his own bakery which is why he’s asked Fundación Campo for a loan to buy 400 bricks, 6 sacks of cement and to pay labor costs to build an artisanal clay oven to bake the bread because gas ovens are very expensive.  This way he will have his own business and will be able to receive better income for his family and provide schooling for his son.  He intends to hire four bakers and about ten salesmen once his bakery is operational.

loans.use: to buy 400 bricks, 6 sacks of cement and to pay labor costs to build an oven.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Henry

texts.es:
Henry es una persona que es conocida por su familia y sus vecinos por ser muy trabajador y dedicado al bienestar de su familia y las demás personas.
Henry, con 40 años de edad, se encuentra casado y es padre de 2 hijos de 2 y 9 años, los cuales son la motivación para trabajar arduamente todos los días.
Henry anteriormente laboraba vinculado a una compañía, pero un día tomó la decisión de independizarse debido a que el trabajo era muy mal pago y no le alcanzaba para generar los ingresos suficientes para el sostenimiento de su familia.
Henry inició su negocio de venta de calzado con un capital muy bajo, pero gracias a los créditos que le han otorgado ha podido ir mejorando su negocio, surtiéndolo con mayor variedad de productos y atrayendo así una mayor clientela. Henry desde entonces ha podido mejorar su empresa considerablemente y actualmente tiene más clientes que los que puede atender.
Es por esto que Henry en el momento busca comprar más surtido de calzado, pero no cuenta con el capital suficiente para realizar la compra de esta mercancía, por lo que tiene la esperanza puesta en que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de mercancía de calzado para surtir su almacén y tener una mayor cantidad para ofrecer a sus clientes.
Henry espera que de esta manera sus ingresos aumenten considerablemente, pues podrá atender a más clientes que antes no podía atender.
Henry tiene el sueño de que su negocio le genere grandes ingresos de modo que pueda brindarles en un futuro una mejor educación, y una estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Henry is person known by his family and neighbors as being very hardworking and devoted to his family’s and other people’s wellbeing.  He’s 40 years old, married and the father of two children who are 2 and 9 years old and who are his motivation to work hard every day.

Henry used to work as an employee in a firm but one day made the decision to go into business for himself because the job didn’t pay very well and he didn’t earn enough income to support his family.  Henry started his shoe selling business with very little capital but thanks to the loans he’s been granted he’s been able to improve his business stocking it with a wider variety of products and attracting a larger clientele.  Since then, Henry has been able to improve his firm considerably and he currently has more customers than he can tend to.

Because of this, henry wants to buy a still wider selection of shoes but lacks sufficient capital to buy this merchandise so he’s placed his hope on a loan that will allow him to buy merchandise to stock his shoe store and have larger amounts to offer his customers.

Henry hopes that his income will increase considerably this way because he will be able to take care of more customers than he’s been able to to date.  Henry’s dream is that his business generates great income so that he can provide a better education and economic stability in future.

loans.use: to buy shoes.

loans.name: Maria Olga

texts.es:
Maria Olga ha sido muy trabajadora durante toda su vida. Con 58 años de edad, y 4 hijos a su cargo, se esfuerza todos los días en su taller con el ánimo de generar los ingresos necesarios para su sustento y para permitirles una mejor calidad de vida.
Maria Olga ha trabajado toda su vida con la confección, y es por esto que sus productos son reconocidos por su buena calidad.
Maria Olga confecciona principalmente uniformes de dotación para empresas y artículos para el hogar, como son cortinas, tendidos, entre otros.

Hace unos días se le averió su máquina fileteadora, por lo que no ha podido trabajar al ritmo que requiere. Además, tiene un gran pedido por parte de uno de sus clientes para entregarles uniformes para la dotación de su empresa.
Es por esto que Maria Olga requiere comprar estos insumos, además de arreglar su máquina fileteadora, sin embargo, no cuenta actualmente con el capital suficiente para ello, por lo que aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de insumos para la confección de uniformes como son la tela, hilos, entre otros, y la reparación de su máquina fileteadora que le permita seguir trabajando normalmente.

Maria Olga tiene el sueño de que sus hijos puedan acceder a una educación universitaria, por esto ahorra lo que más puede para tener los recursos suficientes cuando llegue el momento dado. Además, sueña con que su taller crezca y sus ventas se aumenten, de modo que pueda generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas.
texts.en:
María Olga has been very hardworking her entire life.  She’s 58 years old and has four children in her care.  She strives daily in her workshop hoping to generate the necessary income to support them and attain a better quality of life.  María Olga has worked her entire life sewing and this is why her products are renowned for their good quality.  María Olga primarily produces staff uniforms for firms and household items like curtains and bedspreads, among others.

A few days ago her overlock sewing machine broke down so she’s not been able to work at the usual required pace.  Besides, she has a large pending order from one of her customers to supply uniforms for their firm.  Because of this, María Olga needs to buy supplies and repair her sewing machine.  However, she does not have sufficient capital at present to do so which is why she’s hoping for a loan that will allow her to buy the supplies needed to make the uniforms like fabric and thread, among others, and to repair her sewing machine so that she can continue with her work normally.

María Olga’s dream is that her children can attend University and this is why she saves up all she’s able to in order to have sufficient resources when that moment arrives.  Besides, she also dreams with her shop growing and her sales increasing so that she can generate employment for other, more needy people.

loans.use: to buy supplies and to repair her sewing machine.

loans.name: Tuichi

texts.ru: Туйчи трудолюбивый и добросовестный человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Жена занимается домохозяйством. Более 15 лет он занимается выращиванием ячменя, лука и помидор. Он имеет 4 гектара посевной земли. Он сам один занимается этим бизнесом. Туйчи хотел бы получить займ для покупки минеральных удобрений, семян и ГСМ. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Tuichi is a hard-working and conscientious man. He is married and is raising three children. His wife takes care of the household. Tuichi has been growing barley, onions and tomatoes for over 15 years. He has 4 hectares of arable land, and is the only one taking care of his business. Tuichi would like to obtain a loan in order to purchase mineral fertilizers, seeds and petroleum products. He is looking forward to your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizer, seeds and petroleum products

loans.name: Martha Cecilia

texts.es:
Martha se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajadora y nunca rendirse, y es por esto que su familia la ha sacado adelante a pesar de todas las adversidades que se le han presentado en la vida.
Con 49 años de edad, Martha es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de 2 hijos debido a que el padre de sus hijos la abandonó hace un tiempo. Sin importar esto, Martha ha seguido luchando y trabajando fuertemente con el ánimo de generar los ingresos suficientes para brindarles una buena calidad de vida a sus hijos.
Martha inició con su hermana hace aproximadamente 1 año un almacén donde venden productos de belleza como shampoo, tinturas para el cabello, tratamientos para el cabello, entre otros, y gracias a esto genera los ingresos para el sostenimiento de su hogar.
El negocio ha ido marchando muy bien, y gracias al buen servicio que ofrece Martha, sus clientes han aumentado considerablemente. Es por esto que hoy día sus clientes le piden más productos que los que ella puede ofrecer, y a veces, debe no vender pues no tiene la mercancía suficiente con qué responderles.
Es por esto que Martha busca comprar un mayor surtido de sus productos, sin embargo, actualmente no cuenta con el capital suficiente para ello, por lo que tiene la esperanza puesta en que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de productos de belleza como shampoo, tratamientos para el cabello, tinturas para el cabello, entre otros, y poder así tener su negocio con mayor mercancía y atender así a más clientes que lo requieren.

Martha sueña con que su negocio siga creciendo, y con que le genere buenos ingresos que le permitan brindarles a sus hijos una educación universitaria y en un futuro una estabilidad económica que les evite pasar por tantas adversidades como pasó ella.
texts.en:
Martha has been characterized as being very hardworking and never giving up.  Because of this her family has moved her ahead despite all the adversities that life has presented.  Martha, 49, is a single mother, head of household with two children because her children’s father abandoned her some time ago.  Notwithstanding this, Martha has continued to strive and work hard to generate sufficient income to provide a good quality of life for her children.

Martha started a store about a year ago with her sister where they sell beauty supplies like shampoo, hair coloring and hair treatments, among others and thanks to this she generates income to support her home.

The business has been doing well thanks to the good service Martha offers.  Her customers have increased considerably and this is why at present they are asking for more products than she’s able to offer and sometimes she loses sales because she does not have enough merchandise to meet demand.

Because of this Martha would like to buy a wider selection of products but she currently does not have sufficient capital to do so which is why her hopes are placed on a loan that will make it possible for her to buy beauty supplies like shampoo, hair treatments and hair coloring, among others so that her business will be better stocked with merchandise and she can tend to more customers who want it.

Martha dreams that her business continues growing and generating good income so that she can provide her children with a university education and economic stability in the future that will keep them from going through so many adversities like she’s had to.

loans.use: to buy beauty supplies.

loans.name: Diego Alexander

texts.es:
Decidido y trabajador son la mejor manera de caracterizar a Diego, un joven que desde muy temprana edad viene trabajando fuertemente con el ánimo de generar sus propios ingresos y en un principio colaborarle a sus padres con los gastos del hogar. 
Ahora, Diego tiene una hija de 7 meses con su pareja, y manifiesta que son la motivación para que diariamente se esfuerce en su trabajo para sacarlas adelante.
Diego se ha dedicado gran parte de su vida a administrar bares y discotecas, por lo que un día decidió no trabajar más para nadie y montar su propio negocio. El negocio lo inició con muy bajo capital, pero ha ido aumentándolo gracias a sus buenas ventas.
El bar de Diego tiene algunos inconvenientes debido a que sus enseres se han ido deteriorando por el uso, por lo que debe reparar el sonido y las luces, además, requiere de la compra de mercancía que le permita tener su negocio mejor surtido para sus clientes. Sin embargo, Diego no cuenta con el capital suficiente para realizar estas compras, por lo que tiene la esperanza puesta en que un préstamo le brindará la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de un amplificador para el sonido, la compra de luces, y la compra de mayor surtido de licores para tener con qué responder a los pedidos de sus clientes.

Diego tiene el sueño de que su negocio le brinde mayores ingresos para poder sacar a su familia adelante. Poder brindarle a su esposa una mejor calidad de vida, y a su hija de  meses brindarle todo lo que necesita, y en un futuro no muy lejano, poderla ingresar a una educación de calidad.
texts.en:
Determined and hardworking are the best ways to describe Diego, a young man who has been working hard since an early age to generate his own income and at the beginning to help his parents with household expenses.  Now, Diego and his spouse have a 7-month-old daughter and he states that they are his motivation to work hard every day in order to move them forward.

Diego has spent a large part of his life running bars and discotheques so one day he finally decided to stop working for others and open his own business.  He started it with very little capital but thanks to his sales has been gradually increasing it.

Diego’s bar has a few shortcomings because his furnishings have deteriorated due to use so he has to repair the sound system and lights.  He also needs to buy merchandise that will allow his business to be better stocked for his customers.  However, Diego does not have sufficient capital to make these purchases so he’s put his hope in a loan that will give him the opportunity to buy a sound amplifier, to buy lights and to buy a larger supply of liquor to be able to respond to customer demand.

Diego’s dream is that the business will provide him with higher income to be able to move his family ahead and provide his wife with a better quality of life and his months-old daughter with everything she needs and in the not too distant future enroll her in a quality education.

loans.use: to buy a sound amplifier, lights and to increase his stock of liquor.

loans.name: Tomasa

texts.en:
Tomasa is 40 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is separated with 2 children. 

Tomasa has a retail shop where she buys & sells canned goods, snacks & beverages. She has had this business for 5 years. She requested a loan for 8,000 PHP to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks & beverages.

Tomasa has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Tomasa hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages to sell

loans.name: Jenny

texts.en:
Jenny is 24 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 2 children. 

Jenny has a business selling fish like trout, milk fish & sardines. She has had this business for 5 years. She requested a loan for 8,000 PHP to buy fish to sell.

Jenny has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Jenny hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy fish to sell.

loans.name: Orlando De Jesus

texts.es:
Orlando ha trabajado toda su vida en la actividad de la cría de ganado y cerdos, pero debido a circunstancias adversas en su vida, Orlando tuvo que dejar de lado la actividad por un tiempo. Ahora, Orlando quiere volver a recuperar el trabajo, la actividad que anteriormente le permitía generar los ingresos suficientes para sostener los gastos de su hogar.
Orlando, con 59 años de edad, se encuentra casado y con 3 hijos a su cargo, los que manifiesta son la motivación para trabajar arduamente todos los días.

Orlando, quien siempre se ha caracterizado por querer brindarle un bienestar a su familia, quiere que sus hijos y su esposa tengan una mejor calidad de vida, y es por esto que ahora que tiene la oportunidad, quiere iniciar de nuevo su actividad de la cría de cerdos.
Orlando quiere comprar 7 cerdos para la cría y el concentrado necesario, sin embargo, no cuenta con el capital suficiente para realizar esta compra; es por esto que tiene la esperanza puesta en que un préstamo le permitirá acceder a la compra de los 7 cerdos para la cría y el concentrado necesario para alimentarlos durante un tiempo.

Orlando sueña con recuperar su actividad, tener nuevamente esta actividad como su fuente de ingresos y poder brindarles a sus 3 hijos y su esposa una mejor calidad de vida.
Además, Orlando sueña con que sus hijos puedan acceder a una educación de calidad y tengan en un futuro una estabilidad económica que les evite pasar por tantas adversidades como ha pasado el.
texts.en:
Orlando has worked his entire life raising cattle and pigs but due to adverse life circumstances he had to stop this activity for a time.  Now, Orlando wants to retake the work, an activity which used to allow him to generate sufficient income to cover household expenses.  Orlando is 59 years old, married and has three children in his care who he states are the motivating force behind his daily hard work.

Orlando, who has always been noted for wanting to provide wellbeing for his family, wants his children and his wife to have a better quality of life so now that he has the opportunity he wants to once again start to raise pigs.  Orlando wants to buy 7 pigs to raise and the necessary feed concentrate but he does not have sufficient capital to make this purchase so he has his hope placed on a loan that will make it possible for him to buy the 7 pigs to raise and the necessary feed concentrate to feed them for a certain period of time.

Orlando dreams with restarting his activity and once again have it as a source of income to provide his three children and his wife with a better quality of life.  Besides, Orlando dreams with his children being able to access a quality education so in future they will have economic stability that will keep them from going through so many adversities like he’s had to.

loans.use: to buy 7 pigs and feed concentrate to feed them for a time.

loans.name: Alpidia De Jesus

texts.es:
La señora Alpidia ha sido una persona que ha pasado muchas adversidades en su vida. Con 45 años de edad, se encuentra casada y es madre de 2 hijas de 7 y 15 años. 
Hace un tiempo tuvo una gran dificultad y fue que no pudo conseguir empleo, por lo que no tenía con qué generar los ingresos suficientes para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar, pues con lo que genera su esposo no les alcanza para cubrir todas sus necesidades.
Alpidia, tomó la decisión de montar su propia tienda general donde vende productos de la canasta familiar. Gracias a esta tienda Alpidia genera los ingresos suficientes con los que le colabora a su esposo en el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar.
Alpidia actualmente tiene muy buenas ventas, y sus clientes la tienen como un referente en el sector gracias a su buena atención. Alpidia no ha podido abastecer todas las necesidades de sus clientes, debido a que su mercancía es muy poca y no es muy variada. Es por esto que Alpidia quiere surtir su negocio comprando mercancía de productos de la canasta familiar, pero no tiene el capital suficiente para realizar estas compras; por esto, tiene la esperanza en que un préstamo le brindará la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de productos de la canasta familiar y poder así aumentar la variedad de productos que ofrece a sus clientes.

Alpidia sueña con que su negocio incremente más sus ventas, para que le genere mayores ingresos con los cuales pueda ofrecerles a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida, y una educación de mejor calidad.
texts.en:
Alpidia has been a person who has gone through many adversities in her life.  She’s 45 years old, married and the mother of two daughters who are 7 and 15 years old.  Some time ago she had a great difficulty in that she was unable to find employment so was unable to generate sufficient income to cover her household expenses because what her husband earned wasn’t enough to cover all their needs.

Alpidia decided to open her own grocery store where she sells basic staple items.  Thanks to the store, Alpidia generates enough income to help her husband cover household expenses.

Alpidia’s sales are currently very good and her customers know her in the sector because of her good service.  She’s not been able to meet all her customers’ needs because she has little merchandise and not much variety.  Because of this, Alpidia wants to stock the store buying basic staple items but she does not have enough capital to make these purchases and this is why she has her hope placed on a loan that will allow her to buy basic staple items to increase the variety of items she stocks for her customers.

Alpidia dreams with her business’ sales increasing more so that more income will be generated for her to offer her children a better quality of life and a better quality education.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Michael

texts.en: Michael is 35 years old and married with one child aged seven. He sells food to earn a living, and he has been in the business for one year and has employed two people. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to save his income and hopes to expand his business in the future. He has applied for 10,000 Kenya Shillings to buy sugar and tea leaves.

loans.use: To buy sugar and tea leaves.

loans.name: Mutindi

texts.en:
Mutindi is 34 years old and married with three children. She runs a retail shop to earn a living, and she has been in the business for eight years. She earns extra income from her farming activities. 

Since she joined Faulu Kenya, Mutindi has been able to grow her business and hopes to be financially stable in the future. She has applied for 40,000 Kenya Shillings to buy maize flour and rice.

loans.use: To buy maize flour and rice.

loans.name: Mwende

texts.en:
Mwende is fifty-four years old, married, with three children. She runs a retail shop to earn a living. She has been in the business for one year and has employed one person. 

Since she joined Faulu Kenya,she has been able to grow her business and hopes to be financially stable in the future. She has applied for a loan of 15,000 Kenya Shillings to buy cooking oil, maize flour and sugar to sell.

loans.use: To buy cooking oil, maize flour and sugar to sell.

loans.name: Cosmas

texts.en: Cosmas is 33 years old, and he does motorcycle transport to earn a living. He has been in the business for two years and describes his business environment as competitive because many people do the same business. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to improve his living standards and hopes to be expand his business in the future. He has applied for 20,000 Kenya Shillings to buy a motorbike.

loans.use: To buy a motorbike.

loans.name: Martha Ines

texts.es:
Martha siempre se ha caracterizado por ser una persona muy trabajadora y dedicada a su familia. 
Con 54 años de edad, Martha se encuentra casada y es madre de 2 hijos de 15 y 17 años de edad. Martha, siempre ha querido brindarles la mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos, es por esto que le colabora a su esposo en la generación de ingresos para el hogar. 
Debido a las pocas oportunidades de empleo que se le presentaban, Martha decidió montar su propio negocio de comidas rápidas, el cual ha sido el generador de los ingresos para que ella le pueda colaborar a su esposo en los ingresos del hogar.
Martha, generalmente ha tenido muy buenas ventas, sin embargo, en diciembre debido a la temporada invernal que se vio, sus ventas disminuyeron significativamente, por lo que actualmente no cuenta con mucho dinero disponible. A pesar de que el panorama se le ha venido aclarando a Martha, pues sus ventas han aumentado en el mes de Enero considerablemente, aún cuenta con muy poco dinero disponible para comprar los insumos necesarios para la elaboración de las comidas rápidas para la venta a sus clientes. Es por esto que Martha aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de insumos como salsas, panes, carnes, entre otros para la elaboración de comidas rápidas. 

Martha espera que sus ventas sigan aumentando como lo han hecho en el mes de Enero y poder así seguir generando ingresos suficientes para mejorar la calidad de vida de todas las personas de su hogar.
Martha, tiene el sueño de que su negocio crezca, y en un futuro, le brinde la posibilidad de ofrecerles a sus hijos un acceso a la educación universitaria y una estabilidad económica en sus vidas.
texts.en:
Martha has always been noted for being a very hardworking person who is devoted to her family.  She’s 54 years old, married and the mother of two children who are 15 and 17 years old.  Martha has always wanted to provide a better quality of life for her children and this is why she collaborates with her husband generating income for the home.

Because of the few employment opportunities she had, Martha decided to open her own fast food business which has generated income that she can use to share household expenses with her husband.  Martha’s sales are generally very good.  However, because of the winter conditions in December, sales dropped considerably so she doesn’t have much money available presently.  Even though Martha’s outlook has been improving since January sales have improved considerably, she still has very little disposable money to buy the necessary ingredients to make the fast food to sell to her customers.  This is why Martha hopes for a loan that will give her the opportunity to buy ingredients like sauces, bread, and meat, among others, to make her fast food.

Martha hopes that her sales will continue to increase like they’ve done in the month of January so that she can continue generating sufficient income to improve the quality of life for everyone in her home.  Martha’s dream is that the business grows and in the future to provide her children with access to a university education and economic stability in their life.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Wilson

texts.en:
Wilson lives in Mombasa, Kenya. He is a married and has two children. Wilson runs a business selling charcoal to the residents of this town. He started the business through a loan and has seen the business support the family for thirteen years. 

He is applying for a loan of 20,000 Kenya shillings to purchase more sacks of charcoal. His only challenge is the seasonal business climate; he makes few sales during the low season. Wilson intends to start a barber shop using the additional income from this loan.

loans.use: To purchase more sacks of charcoal.

loans.name: Mwendwa

texts.en:
Mwendwa is 24 years old, and he does carpentry to earn a living. He has been in the business for two years and has employed two people. He describes his business environment as competitive because many people do the same business. 

Since he joined Faulu Kenya, Mwendwa has been able to save his income and hopes to expand his business in the future. He has applied for 15,000 Kenya Shillings to buy timber and nails.

loans.use: To buy timber and nails.

loans.name: Lillian

texts.en: Lillian is married and has three children ranging from seventeen to twenty-four years of age. She describes herself as an honest woman. She has been selling clothes for the last year to residents. She describes her business challenge as inadequate funds to improve her clothes selling business. She will use the loan of Kes 20,000 to buy more clothes to sell. In the future, Lillian hopes  to run a well-stocked boutique in the nearby town.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Mwendwa

texts.en: Mwendwa is 32 years old,and he does masonry to earn a living. He has been in the business for two years and has employed one person. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to save his income and hopes to grow his business in the future. He has applied for 10,000 Kenya Shillings to buy cement and sand.

loans.use: To buy cement and sand.

loans.name: Fundi

texts.en: Fundi is 23 years old, and he does tailoring to earn a living. He has been in the business for one year and has employed two people. He describes his business environment as competitive because many people do the business. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to save his income and hopes to grow his business in the future. He has applied for 15,000 Kenya Shillings to buy a sewing machine.

loans.use: To buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel, twenty-eight years old, is married and has two children aged one and four. He describes himself as a focused man. He has been running a general store for the last six years. He sells items such as fertilizers, pesticides, fungicides and provides mobile phone money transaction services (M-pesa services). 

His business challenge is insufficient funds for the  expansion of his business. He will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy animal and farm products such as fertilizers, pesticides, fungicides etc. In the next five years. Samuel hopes and dreams of running several similar retail stores in the nearby towns.

loans.use: to buy more animal and farm products such as fertilizers, pesticides and fungicides.

loans.name: Samuel Enrique

texts.es:
Samuel ha sido una persona muy trabajadora durante toda su vida, y ahora, quiere que su trabajo de buenos frutos montando su propio negocio. 
Samuel montó una tienda general hace aproximadamente 2 años, sin embargo, ha tenido tan bajo capital que no ha podido aumentar considerablemente la cantidad de productos que ofrece a sus clientes.
Es por esto que Samuel actualmente quiere que su tienda tenga más productos que ofrecer, de modo que sus clientes encuentren en la tienda mayores oportunidades de satisfacer sus necesidades. Samuel entonces, quiere comprar productos de la canasta familiar que le permitan tener una mejor tienda para los clientes, sin embargo, actualmente no cuenta con el capital suficiente para realizar estas compras, por lo que aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de productos de la canasta familiar con los que pueda aumentar la variedad que ofrece a sus clientes. 

Samuel, con 57 años de edad, se encuentra casado y es padre de 3 hijos, a los cuales les quiere brindar la mejor educación posible y una estabilidad económica en un futuro.
Samuel sueña con que su negocio pueda crecer en ventas y de esta manera pueda abrir un minimercado en un futuro, y este les conceda una estabilidad económica para que no tenga que pasar por más adversidades en su vida.
texts.en:
Samuel has been a very hard worker all of his life, and now, after starting his own business, wants his hard work to pay off.
Samuel started a general store about 2 years ago, but his sales have been so low, he hasn’t been able to increase the amount of products he offers his customers.
That’s why Samuel would like to be able to offer more products in his store, so his customers can find more opportunities to satisfy their needs. 
And so, Samuel wants to buy everyday groceries that allow him to have a bigger store for his customers, but he doesn’t have enough capital to make these purchases. He hopes to get a loan that will enable him the opportunity to increase the variety he offers his customers. 
Samuel is a married, 57-year-old father to 3 children. He’d like to offer his children the best education possible and a stable economic future.
Samuel dreams that his business will grow in sales so in the future he can open a minimarket that will allow him economical stability so he won’t have to live through any more adversity in his life.

loans.use: buy everday groceries that allow him to stock his business with a bigger variety of products.

loans.name: Jillo

texts.en:
Jillo lives in the Coastal town of Malindi, Kenya. She is a married mother of two and owns a grocery stall. She started off by buying tomatoes, greens, etc. and distributing to her known customers. 

Jillo was introduced to Milango by her friends and is applying for a loan of 40,000 Kenya shillings to purchase more fruit and repair the stall. She intends to start selling cereals in future despite the occasional challenges of inflation and high transportation costs.

loans.use: To purchase more fruit and repair the stall.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a refrigerator and more broilers.

loans.name: Asmaa

texts.en:
Asmaa is a 38-year-old woman, who is single and lives with her mother who is suffering from cancer and gets a low amount grant treatment from Palestinian Social Affairs, but not enough to cover the costs of treatment.

Asmaa is requesting a 2,000 USD loan from FATEN to help her cover the cost of treatment for her mother. This will improve her mother's health. Asmaa is photographed in the picture.

loans.use: To pay the cost of treatment for her mother.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for making some necessary repairs to his house.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es: Luz, de 47 años de edad . tiene dos hijos es originaria de la ciudad de Granada , de oficio comerciante, tiene una pulpería en su casa de habitación . La cual inicio como un medio de subsistencia para generar ingresos y mantener a su familia pues al separarse de su  ex esposo no quiso depender solo de lo que el le pudiera dar y además demostrarle que ella podía salir adelante por si misma. Ya tiene 8 años de tener su pulpería la cual le ayudado a salir adelante a su familia y al mismo tiempo brinda servicio de mucha utilidad su vecindario al abastecer de productos comestibles. Ella realizo el crédito para compra de granos básicos, aceite, frijoles , productos de limpieza , enlatados, avenas, leche y jugos. Son productos muy populares y demandados por su clientela y además le permiten mejorar sus ingresos y poder ahorrar para los estudios universitarios de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Luz, is 47 years old. She has two children and is originally from the city of Granada. She is a shopkeeper with a small grocery store in her home. She started the business as a means of subsistence to make an income and take care of her family. After separating from her ex-husband she did not want to rely solely on what he was able to give her and she wanted to she wanted to show him that she could get ahead on her own. 

She has had the store for eight years now. It has helped her to get her family ahead and at the same time it offers a very useful service to her neighborhood by supplying food items.
